name: GetReceivedDebits
description:
Retrieve a list of received debits from Stripe Treasury.

Call this tool to obtain a list of received debits, which can be useful for financial reporting or auditing purposes.

parameters.name: financial_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the FinancialAccount from which funds were pulled.

value_schema.description: The FinancialAccount that funds were pulled from.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_previous_page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to fetch the previous page of the list. Use an object ID received in a previous response.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: expand_fields
parameters.description: List of fields in the response to expand for more detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: max_number_of_debits
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of received debits to return. Accepts an integer between 1 and 100, default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after
parameters.description: An object ID for pagination to fetch the next page, starting after this ID.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.
Only return ReceivedDebits that have the given status: `succeeded` or `failed`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.
